verbs.description: The pharmaceutical giant Novartis [V: is] madly conducting damage control after admitting early Wednesday to paying $ 1.2 million to Donald Trump 's longtime fixer Michael Cohen beginning in the early months of the Trump administration . Anonymous sources ...
